MY GOALS

BUILD A STRONG PORTFOLIO

Complete and showcase a variety of projects including personal projects and any freelance work

IMPROVE UI/UX SKILLS

Learn basic design principles such as color theory, typography and layout. Get comfortable with design tools like figma, sketch or Adobe XD.

EXPAND KNOWLEDGE OF BACKEND TECHNOLOGIES

Gain a basic understanding of back-end technologies like Node.js, Express ot databases like MongoDB

OPTIMIZE FOR PERFORMANCE AND ACCESSIBILITY

Learn techniques for optimizing website performance such as lazy loading, code splitting and minimizing HTTP requests. Understand and implement web accessibility standards to make websites useful for everyone

NETWORKING

Join developer communities, attend meetups, and engage in networking to learn from peers and industry leaders

CERTIFICATIONS

Complete relevant online courses and certifications to validate skills and knowledge.
